alert.note: Alert for Barnwell (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 22 at 11:55PM EDT until June 23 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central South Carolina, including the following area, Barnwell. * WHEN...Until 1245 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1155 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Barnwell, Williston, Blackville, Barnwell State Park, Snelling, Elko and Barnwell County Airport. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
